message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.CC

Reasoning: 
1. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper discusses the efficient encoding and decoding algorithms of cyclic codes, which are widely used in communication systems. This falls under the scope of information theory.
2. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper discusses different approaches to constructing cyclic codes, which involves algorithms and data structures.
3. cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) - Cyclic codes have applications in data storage systems, which can be related to social and information networks.
4. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - Cyclic codes are used in communication systems, which are related to networking and internet architecture.
5. cs.CC (Computational Complexity) - The paper discusses open problems related to the construction of cyclic codes, which can be related to computational complexity.
